title: Solve all of these math questions and you can join my club.
body:
All you basically have to do is pass 6th grade math LOL!

1) 2x = 8, solve for x

2) 2x^2 - 8 = 0, solve for x

3) x^2 + 2x = 3, solve for x

4) 3x^3 + 6x^2 = 9x, solve for x

5) 5^x = 25, solve for x

6) 5^x = 10, solve for x

7) y - 2 = 4 (x + 6), find the slope & y-intercept

8) (x^3)^2 = ?

Most people didn't even make it to number 4 on my friends list. Call it a social experiment, but I am seriously appalled at how little people seem to retain knowledge of simple algebra. One person even tried to argue with me that 2) is invalid LOL.
